rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance leading into a combined living-dining area that adheres to Vastu principles by facing the auspicious south-east direction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities and proper ventilation; placement according to local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom on the ground floor offering privacy and a north-facing aspect in keeping with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional sleeping space for guests, aligned towards the east for positivity as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library with shelves and comfortable seating; ideally placed in a quiet corner of the ground floor with north or east orientation to promote mental clarity.

openings.name: French Window
openings.location: Living Area facing the garden for natural light.

openings.name: Window
openings.location: Kitchen, oriented to receive morning sunlight from the east.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space with ample lighting and minimal distractions, ideally positioned facing the north to harness productive energy.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A fully equipped private gym designed for personal workouts; ventilated and placed in a location that avoids interference with the main living areas.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: An outdoor balcony attached to the home office offering a view of nature; enhances air quality and relaxation.
